description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Transform an ally into a random 5 cost follower from any faction.
descriptionRaw: Play: Transform an ally into a random 5 cost follower from any faction.
flavorText:
"Marvolio? Where... Where are my hands?"
"I will-a now make-a them appear! Tadaa! Ahem. Ta... daa...!"
"...WHERE ARE MY HANDS?!"
"OKAY, TIME-A TO GO! THANK-A YOU ALL SO VERY MUCH!"
name: Mystifying Magician
